name: Eis Planet Schlange
description:
EIS PLANET SCHLANGEN!

2 - 128 player coop experience on the same screen

(if you play with more than 5 players, please let us know how it went as we could not test it lol)

Use PHYSICS to sling ice asteroids into the expanding sun to cool it.
But watch out for the space snakes!

Controls :
MINIMUM ONE CONTROLLER REQUIRED TO PLAY!
(Keyboard ->Ship , Controller -> Astronaut)

Keyboard ( Ship only):
WASD - Move / Steer ship
Space - Shoot
Shift    - Boost

Controller (astronaut) :
LS - move direction
RS - aim

LT - Grab
RT - Shoot

Controller (ship):

LS - Rotate
RS - Strafe + Move up down

LT - Shoot
RT - Boost
